scripts.build:vendor: mkdir -p vendor/grapesjs && cp node_modules/grapesjs/dist/grapes.min.js vendor/grapesjs/grapes.min.js && cp node_modules/grapesjs/dist/css/grapes.min.css vendor/grapesjs/grapes.min.css && node -e "console.log(require.resolve('grapesjs-mjml'))" | xargs -I{} npx esbuild {} --bundle --format=iife --global-name=grapesjsMjml --external:grapesjs --define:process.env.NODE_ENV=\"'production'\" --outfile=vendor/grapesjs-mjml.umd.js
